transArray.content: The breakfast is delicious. It looks very clean and hygienic. The hotel environment is also very good. It has no smell and is very comfortable. I booked a room without windows and upgraded to a room with windows. Itâ€™s really good. Highly recommended.
The time is just right, the breeze is not dry, thank you old friend for your support, Xiao Ji is willing to accompany you through the long years.
